sermons.title: (Genesis) 15 - Noah and the Power of the Minority
(Genesis) 17 - Noah's House Saved, the World Condemned
(Genesis) 19 - The Prophecy of Noah and the Race Question
(Genesis) 20 - The Table of Nations;  or the History of the Sons of Noah
(Hebrews) 6-Noah
sermons.description: "And as it was in the days of Noah, so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man." We live in an age in which living the Christ-life and keeping His commandments is almost as outlandish as building an ark in the desert! Noah was "moved by fear" at the word of the Lord and became a preacher of righteousness (2 Peter 2:5). Such men are needed today!
sermons.preacher_description:
Leonard Ravenhill (1907 Â– 1994)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Leonard Ravenhill in mp3 format. A revivalist and man of God who sought God's will above all else. He was a man of prayer who practiced what he preached. He wrote the book: 'Why Revival Tarries' which has become a classic on revival. His prophetic edge and burden made him to be respected by some and disliked by others. Yet he stayed true to God's call on his life prayed and pleading for true heaven sent revival. 

"Those who know of Leonard Ravenhill recognize in him the religious specialist, the man sent from God to battle the priests of Baal on their own mountain top, to shame the careless priest at the altar, to face the false prophet, and to warn the people who are being led astray by him. " - Tozer | "Leonard Ravenhill was one of the few men I have ever known who was a true prophet." - David Wilkerson

sermons.title: Men Like Noah in Days Like Noah
sermons.description: Recently Brian preached a message at the â€œLet Us Rise Menâ€™s Conferenceâ€ in Barnsdall, OK. Brian preached a powerful message, one I dare say every man today needs to hear, called, â€œMen Like Noah In Days Like Noah.â€ Brian sounds a clear clarion call for the men of our day to: Wake Up, Get Up, Clean Up, Stand Up, Build Up, Never Give Up, & Look Up.
sermons.preacher_description:
Brian Long ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Brian Long in mp3 format. Brother Brian Long is the pastor of Cornerstone Community Church of Barnsdall. God has done a powerful work in this brothers life as he has served as a baptist pastor for a season and now God has called him out to a independent work under the Headship of Jesus Christ.
He has spoken at SermonIndex Conference as well as other revival meetings in Churches across America. His burden and passion for the glory of Jesus Christ alone is evident in his preaching. The emphasis on prayer and the prayer meeting in their fellowship has been the power behind the local church, you are welcome to visit locally for their prayer time on Wednesday.

sermons.title: Noah and the dispersal from Babel
Obedience of Grace - Illustrated by Noah
sermons.description: "God used Noah," explains Ed Miller, "to give us the secret of missions, obedience and the Christian life."  Brother Ed expounds how Noah (as a type of the believer) saw the ark (Christ as Savior) and that revelation consumed his life.  As the ark got bigger, the man Noah got smaller; and when he finally disappeared into the ark, the great miracle of obedience happened!  (NOTE: Pt. 2: Obedience of Faith - Illustrated by the Disciples on the Stormy Sea)
